Description: Pottery lamp. Traces of thin, dull, brownish red slip only showing near nozzle; crack in wall; burning around nozzle; surface very friable
Acquisition notes: In reference to objects 2010,5009.1-34: 'They were acquired from various sources including shops in Kensington Church Street, Cecile Court and New Caledonian Market from about 1948 to 1962'.
